message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $140.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $135.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to propose a price of $128 for the product.
I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment and offer the product to you for $132.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $129 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer the product to you for $131.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to propose a price of $129.50 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $130.25.
